isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - 7000 - 7000 Model Series - HOOD

svcproc.title: HOOD
svcproc.para: The fiberglass hood is a sculptured hood with bonded fender sections. The hood is a tilting type. The streamlined, tilting, fiberglass hoods provide aerodynamics and functional design styling, while still enclosing the air cleaner. The 7600 series hood has additional filler panels across the front face below the grille, and under each of the valance sections. These are furnished to help protect the engine and related components from dirt and other debris that may damage or affect the performance of the engine and or underhood components.

The 73-7500 and 7600 series hood assemblies have the same basic components with the except for a three inch filler panel under the grille and headlight areas on the 7600. The 7600 series valance is shorter in length to allow for the set forward axle configuration.
